ygData.subject: Re: Dwarven Axe?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... will ... If you can do it, it s ok. You will have a very good dmg/delay ratio. IMHO, your character is a very young, and you don t really need it. In a few
ygData.messageBody:
>i was thinking about equipping my lvl 3 guy with a dwarven axe.... what
will
>this do to my character?

If you can do it, it's ok. You will have a very good dmg/delay ratio.
IMHO, your character is a very young, and you don't really need it. In a few
levels, you could have a mino axe (dmg 8, delay 37 (not sure), heavy !!!)
until the first 10s. Plus, you could loose your corpse easily, and not be
able to have it back before it disappears. I remember it happened to me at
lvl 3 and I lost my guild tunic. I can imagine if I had a dwarven battle axe
at that time. Well, I was a real newby at that time, and I went to Lesser
Faydark. I ran to the browny camp while running from a centurion :o)

Erwin, Paladin of Tunare, Fennin Ro
